content: S-MD HWH and HHWH #2 Self-drilling hex screws Self-drilling hex head screw (zinc-plated) for fastening sheet metal to steel substructures ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast and robust self-drilling screw point Galvanized zinc coating for indoor use Choice between Hex Washer Head (HWH) and High Hex Washer Head (HHWH) Applications Fastening sheet metal to steel substructures – maximum combined thickness up to 0.118 inch Fabricating and installing HVAC ducts Fastening accessories to steel (electrical boxes, clips etc.) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Hexagon head Collated: No Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor Technical Data | Screw head type | Hexagon head | Collated | No | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor ### ITEMS- 311438 - Self-drill screw 8-18 x 1/2 HWH2 - Package Size 10000 pc - 311445 - Self-drill screw 10-16 x 1/2 HWH2 - Package Size 8500 pc - 311439 - Self-drill screw 8-18 x 3/4 HWH2 - Package Size 10000 pc - 311446 - Self-drill screw 10-16 x 3/4 HWH2 - Package Size 6500 pc - 312011 - Pilot point screw 10-16 x 7/8 HHWH - Package Size 6000 pc - 311447 - Self-drill screw 10-16 x 1 HWH2 - Package Size 5000 pc - 312010 - Self-drill screw 12-14 x 1 HWH STI - Package Size 3000 pc - 2415107 - Self-drill screw S-MD 8-18x3/4 HWH2 CRC - Package Size 10000 pc
